body_html: @ezyang Re vec256 testing: are you talking about c++ testing directly on those functions? We do have higher level testing, i.e., running the PyTorch python test suite on NO_AVX_NO_AVX2, NO_AVX2, and AVX2 (see pytorch-linux-xenial-cuda8-cudnn6-py3 build).
body_text: @ezyang Re vec256 testing: are you talking about c++ testing directly on those functions? We do have  higher level testing, i.e., running the PyTorch python test suite on NO_AVX_NO_AVX2, NO_AVX2, and AVX2 (see pytorch-linux-xenial-cuda8-cudnn6-py3 build).
body: @ezyang Re vec256 testing: are you talking about c++ testing directly on those functions? We do have  higher level testing, i.e., running the PyTorch python test suite on `NO_AVX_NO_AVX2`, `NO_AVX2`, and `AVX2` (see` pytorch-linux-xenial-cuda8-cudnn6-py3` build).
